doc.title: STUN

value.content: STUN (Session Traversal Utilities for NAT) is an auxiliary protocol for transmitting data around a NAT (Network Address Translator). STUN returns the IP address, port, and connectivity status of a networked computer behind a NAT.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• STUN on Wikipedia
  • WebRTC protocols
